name: Dream Disc
description:
Headphones recommended.

Interact with your dreams in a whole new way!

  • Click and hold to charge up the dream disc
  • Each shot costs one energy
  • Hit bumpers to gain back energy
  • Touch all the bumpers to score the room
  • Relax and make your shots count
  • How many rooms can you score before your energy runs out?

Keys:
(space) .......................... Start new run
(f) ................................... Toggle fullscreen
(esc) ............................... Quit

A game by:
Peter Rockwell and Kira Boom

___Made for Ludum Dare 39 in 72 hours.
___Updated version created post-jam with gameplay fixes and new levels.
